title: I See God on The Narrow Road
description: I See God on the Narrow Road gives the reader an opportunity to draw attention to the character of her or his life - to discover through personal choices and experiences how a single decision can become a positive or negative influence on not just one but many. The standards we set for ourselves make a difference.Do you know what kind of persuasion you have on people today who are on the same narrow path you are on?
author: Shirley Kiger Connolly
